bibl.title: Nauklêroi, Kybernêtai and Nauklêrokybernêtai and their Ships in Roman and Byzantine Egypt.
bibl.note: 1. Imperial ships [1-4]. - 2a. Public (government) ships [5-13]. - 2b. Ships of the fiscus [14-17]. - 2c. Ship of the provincial governor and/or his staff [18]. - 3. Ship of the catholic church [19]. - 4. Private ships owned by kybernêtai [20-32]. - 5. Ships owned privately by a third party [33-92]. - 6. Ship for transporting mummies [93]. - 7. Ship equipped with a cabin [94]. - 8. Ship qualifications unclear / in dispute [95-96]. - 9. Detailed ownership qualifications lacking [97-107]. - Pp. 277-278: Appendix 1. A Reedition of P. Bodl. I, 25. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Klaas A. Worp, Nauklêroi, Kybernêtai and Nauklêrokybernêtai and their Ships in Roman and Byzantine Egypt.

1. Imperial ships [1-4]. - 2a. Public (government) ships [5-13]. - 2b. Ships of the fiscus [14-17]. - 2c. Ship of the provincial governor and/or his staff [18]. - 3. Ship of the catholic church [19]. - 4. Private ships owned by kybernêtai [20-32]. - 5. Ships owned privately by a third party [33-92]. - 6. Ship for transporting mummies [93]. - 7. Ship equipped with a cabin [94]. - 8. Ship qualifications unclear / in dispute [95-96]. - 9. Detailed ownership qualifications lacking [97-107]. - Pp. 277-278: Appendix 1. A Reedition of P. Bodl. I, 25. - Avec résumé en anglais.
